text: It's funny - I read that women look to chiseled-faced guys for one-night stands, and to round-faced guys for marriage. When I'm rounder in the face, I like to say, 'This is my long-term look.' Or 'This is my wife-and-kids look right here.'
author: Garrett Hedlund

text: That's a funny thing, fame. People definitely do treat you differently. When you begin to be successful, people say, 'Don't go changing.' Well, that's easy to say, but the fact is, you don't change at all - other people do.
author: Jonathan Rhys Meyers

text: It is funny what a year can do.
author: Victor Cruz

text: I think sometimes my humor is extremely dry, and a lot of times I would say things that I thought were very funny but... I have a reputation of - people think of me as a very fundamentalist, humorless fellow.
author: Ian MacKaye

text: There's no such thing as soy milk. It's soy juice.
author: Lewis Black

text: I don't just try to be funny.
author: Bil Keane

text: I don't happen to have a sense of humor personally, so I don't know what's funny about a character... This happens to be a feature of my life generally.
author: Wallace Shawn

text: I like the hot-cold, the sugar-salt, being able to play over-the-top and dramatic things - in the same film. Just as in my life, I can be very funny and at other times almost extinguished.
author: Jean Dujardin

text: I tend to play characters that I can infuse with certain kinds of humour. Even the baddest guy can be funny in his own particular way. I want the audience to engage with the character on some deeper level so that they leave the cinema still thinking about him.
author: Samuel L. Jackson

text: It's funny, when bands or younger musicians ask me: 'So, what does it take to make it?' Well, first explain to me what you mean by 'making it': Do you want to be a rock star or do you want music to be your livelihood?
author: Eddie Van Halen

text: A man's got to take a lot of punishment to write a really funny book.
author: Ernest Hemingway

text: Hurried and worried until we're buried, and there's no curtain call, Lifes a very funny proposition after all.
author: George M. Cohan

text: This is going to sound really funny. I have a poster of Zac Efron on my wall! I think every girl has a poster of him in their room so, why not join the club!
author: Vanessa Hudgens

text: I think when you do comedy, you play by a different set of rules. No one really wants you to be in that good shape. Being in good shape implies a level of vanity that isn't necessarily funny.
author: Seth Rogen

text: When we criticize in Iran the actions of the government, the fundamentalists say that we and the Bush Administration are in the same camp. The funny thing is that human rights activists and Mr. Bush can never be situated in the same group.
author: Shirin Ebadi

text: It's funny with fiction - once you cut something, it hasn't happened anymore.
author: George Saunders

text: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
author: Bertrand Russell

text: I wish I could be as thin as Jessica Simpson. I think she looks gorgeous! I have had Jessica on my show several times, and I can tell you that girl is genuine and funny with a great self-deprecating sense of humor.
author: Rachael Ray

text: I think I would say 'The King's Speech' is surprisingly funny, in fact the audiences in London, Toronto, LA, New York commented there's more laughter in this film than in most comedies, while it is also a moving tear-jerker with an uplifting ending.
author: Tom Hooper

text: Funny is funny.
author: Don Rickles

text: I used to think that everything was just being funny but now I don't know. I mean, how can you tell?
author: Andy Warhol

text: The most exciting phrase to hear in science, the one that heralds new discoveries, is not 'Eureka!' but 'That's funny...'
author: Isaac Asimov

text: I have no idea what I'm going to say when I stand up to give a toast. But I do know that anything I say I find funny.
author: Don Rickles

text: Very often, I don't make it through moments of recording because it is genuinely funny and absolutely ridiculous that a 60-year-old grown man is making these noises.
author: David Ogden Stiers

text: I've always found it easier to be funny than to be serious.
author: Molly Ivins

text: I have an older sister named Haley and she wanted to be an actress. So I wanted to be an actress. It's really funny the way that some people don't give kids enough credit for like really being driven, and really wanting to do things so badly.
author: Hilary Duff

text: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
author: Isaac Asimov

text: It's funny, in a way the actor is a writer. It's not like the two things are so separate as to be like apples and oranges. The writer and the actor are one.
author: Sam Shepard

text: I'm not a very serious person. You know how they say that clowns are very funny in public and are really sad at home? I'm really kind of stupid at home and more serious in public.
author: Roland Joffe

text: It is possible in this world to be pretty and funny and successful all at the same time.
author: Olivia Munn

text: It's funny about men and women. Men pay in cash to get them and pay in cash to get rid of them. Women pay emotionally coming and going. Neither has it easy.
author: Hedy Lamarr

text: You can't really be strong until you see a funny side to things.
author: Ken Kesey

text: It's funny, because I never think of myself as Little Miss All-Together.
author: Courteney Cox

text: My grandchildren are fabulous and funny.
author: Erica Jong

text: Sometimes, comics will make the observation that it's not jokes that are funny, it's characters that are funny. And isn't that true! That's why I always kill jokes. I'm terrible at them, because I get the joke right, but I can't get the character right, and it just goes down like a lead balloon.
author: David Mitchell

text: Nothing's funny about someone who's successful.
author: Drew Carey

text: I thought 'Borat' was a breakthrough comedy, because it was really funny. It wasn't some studio-produced script with 14 writers.
author: Steve Martin

text: I'm just not one of those naturally funny, relaxed actors who enjoy the spotlight and are so good at it.
author: Heath Ledger

text: Cheryl Cole and Katy Perry are two of the hottest girls in the world - and so normal and funny with it. If I was a few years older they are the kind of girls I'd like to date. I want a younger version of Cheryl and Katy - a mixture of the two would be hot.
author: Justin Bieber

text: And I think that being able to make people laugh and write a book that's funny makes the information go down a lot easier and it makes it a lot more fun to read, easier to understand, and often stronger. So there's all kinds of advantages to it.
author: Al Franken

text: I'd luv to kiss ya, but I just washed my hair.
author: Bette Davis

text: It's a funny thing, the less people have to live for, the less nerve they have to risk losing nothing.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

text: I'm a pretty funny guy, and I would love to do a comedy with a bunch of funny guys - movie-star guys, where they could help me through it.
author: LeBron James

text: There is nothing funny about Halloween. This sarcastic festival reflects, rather, an infernal demand for revenge by children on the adult world.
author: Jean Baudrillard

text: People don't want to listen to a celebrity tweeting about their charities and shows. That's why comedy writers do well - we put out little funny ideas.
author: Mindy Kaling

text: Frisbeetarianism is the belief that when you die, your soul goes up on the roof and gets stuck.
author: George Carlin

text: The fact that the Kardashians could be more popular than a show like 'Mad Men' is disgusting. It's a super disgusting part of our culture, but I still find it funny to make a joke about it.
author: Jonah Hill

text: Communism is like one big phone company.
author: Lenny Bruce

text: If it's inappropriate to write about, if there's nothing funny about it, then it's not funny.
author: Calvin Trillin

text: I had everything I'd hoped for, but I wasn't being myself. So I decided to be honest about who I was. It was strange: The people who loved me for being funny suddenly didn't like me for being... me.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

text: I failed to make the chess team because of my height.
author: Woody Allen

text: I have an inability to enjoy things, but that's why we're in comedy. If we were happy, we wouldn't be funny, I guess.
author: Paul Feig

text: I actually think of being funny as an odd turn of mind, like a mild disability, some weird way of looking at the world that you can't get rid of.
author: Calvin Trillin

text: Even as a kid I was never the generator of humor, but I always knew who was funny, who to hang out with.
author: Andrew Stanton

text: You need to be silly to be funny.
author: William Shatner

text: I feel sorry for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day.
author: Frank Sinatra

text: Every man has his follies - and often they are the most interesting thing he has got.
author: Josh Billings

text: I'm a big fan of certain new acts. I love any genre of music, and I think it's really great to see that there are new artists coming through. It's kinda funny to think that I'm like the old man on campus now. But I'm really happy for groups like One Direction. I think they're really good guys.
author: Joe Jonas

text: I don't think anyone should write their autobiography until after they're dead.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

text: It's funny, growing up there was never anybody around me with any kind of artistic bent.
author: Nick Offerman

text: By all means let's be open-minded, but not so open-minded that our brains drop out.
author: Richard Dawkins

text: Johnny Rotten. He's a big fan of mine. I used to see him out in the audience in England and he'd stand up and holler. He's funny. Smart too, and a nice guy. Don't think he's a jerk because he isn't.
author: Don Van Vliet

text: It's funny when people say, 'I don't think Julia likes me.' Honey, if I don't like you, you're going to know about it.
author: Julia Roberts

text: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
author: Will Rogers

text: A pessimist is a person who has had to listen to too many optimists.
author: Don Marquis

text: I don't believe that anybody has come to a conclusion on why something is funny. It's funny because it's ridiculous and it's ridiculous for different reasons at different times.
author: Jackie Mason

text: Memory is funny. Once you hit a vein the problem is not how to remember but how to control the flow.
author: Tobias Wolff
